ST Web Monitor - Chrome Web Store Description:

Description:
ST Web Monitor is a focused, efficient tool that helps you track changes to specific elements on any webpage. Simply select what you want to monitor, and get notified when changes occur.

Key Features:
✓ Easy Selection: Click and drag to choose exactly what to monitor
✓ Flexible Notifications: Choose between browser notifications or Telegram
✓ Custom Intervals: Set your preferred check frequency
✓ Visual Feedback: Clear highlighting shows what you're monitoring
✓ Privacy-Focused: Minimal permissions, maximum security

How It Works:

Click "Select Area" and choose what to monitor
Set your preferred notification method
Choose check interval (in seconds)
Start monitoring and get notified of changes
Perfect For:
• Tracking price changes
• Monitoring stock availability
• Following news updates
• Watching forum posts
• Tracking website updates

Privacy & Permissions:
• activeTab: Used only when selecting areas to monitor
• notifications: For sending browser notifications
• storage: Saves your preferences locally
• alarms: Manages check intervals
• scripting: Required for monitoring functionality

Technical Details:
• Efficient page monitoring
• Automatic refresh at set intervals
• Persistent monitoring across sessions
• Clear visual feedback
• Simple, intuitive interface

Whether you're tracking prices, waiting for updates, or monitoring important information, ST Web Monitor provides a streamlined, secure way to stay informed about webpage changes.

Note: When using Telegram notifications, you'll need to provide your own bot token and chat ID.

Start monitoring web changes efficiently with ST Web Monitor!
